attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As President Brown has made a mockery of his Britishness and the removal of Britannia from our 50p coin is the latest example, we demand this idea be scrapped!
Britannia should stay well and truly put on our 50p coin!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
